Content.Text: If I plant these here, they won't grow.
I can't plant seeds here.
There's already something planted here.
I can't plant this seedling here.
I can't plant paddy seedlings here.
I should plant these in the spring.
I can't use fertilizer here.
There's no point using fertilizer on ripe crops.
There's no point using any more fertilizer here.
I've already used fertilizer on this.
There's no point using fertilizer now.
I can plant mushroom spores here!
Mushroom spores have already been planted.
No ripe <GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>.
I should put my items away and start harvesting!
My bag is too full to put this in.
Got <GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN> x <MOJI1>!
There's no point using fertilizer now.
I can't use this kind of fertilizer here.
I should use this after planting mushrooms.
I've already used fertilizer on this today.
There's no point using any more.
This isn't the right season to harvest these.
I shouldn't harvest other people's crops.
The crop wilted. I should cut it with a <BLUE>sickle</BLUE>.
It's wilting. I should use my <BLUE>watering can</BLUE>!
Can't plant it right now. There are animals here.
Can't plant it right now. Something's in the way.
